results.title: WNBA Delivers Record-Setting 2024 Season
results.creator: WNBA
results.description: TThe WNBA delivered its most-watched regular season in 24 years, finished with its highest attendance in 22 years and set records for digital consumption and merchandise sales in 2024.

results.title: Derrick Rose Retires after 16 Seasons in NBA
results.creator: Josh Wegman
results.description: Former NBA MVP and Rookie of the Year Derrick Rose announced his retirement Thursday after 16 seasons.

results.title: Volkov injured, out of UFC 308 rematch vs. Gane
results.creator: Nick Baldwin
results.description: Heavyweight contender Alexander Volkov has been forced to withdraw from his rematch with Ciryl Gane at UFC 308 after suffering a knee injury, he announced Tuesday on Instagram.

results.title: Fantasy football buzz: Adams, McBride ruled out, Olave injured in practice
results.creator: ESPN Fantasy
results.description: Everything that happens in the NFL has some additional context when viewed from a fantasy football perspective. From position battles to injuries and so much more, the news cycle will constantly affect player values in fantasy football.

results.title: How an NBA sixth man built a $600M empire
results.creator: Baxter Holmes, ESPN Senior Writer
results.description: ONE DAY IN 1988, a woman approached the counter of a Wendy's fast food restaurant in South Milwaukee. 'Here's your food,' a tall man said, pushing a tray toward her. Puzzled, she peered up at the man, whom she recognized as an NBA player, then down at her food, then back at him. Later that week, the woman called into a local radio station.

results.title: The joy, sorrow and celebration of the A's final game in Oakland
results.creator: Tim Keown, ESPN Senior Writer
results.description: No crowd in baseball looks like an Oakland crowd. An Oakland crowd is people of all backgrounds, all ethnicities; people who save up to buy tickets; people who aren't there just to take a photo that proves their presence; people who don't care if nobody can understand how they can love a team that has worked so tirelessly to impede their joy. And kids, so many kids, a quaint throwback to the game's roots as the affordable game, the every-day game, the people's game. In leaving Oakland, Major League Baseball is leaving behind the most diverse fan base in baseball.

results.title: Canucks' Dakota Joshua reveals he had cancerous tumor removed
results.creator: Field Level Media
results.description: Vancouver Canucks forward Dakota Joshua announced Tuesday he was diagnosed with testicular cancer this summer and underwent surgery to remove a tumor.

results.title: Tottenham's Postecoglou: Not sustainable for Son to play so much
results.creator: Tom Chambers
results.description: LONDON -- Ange Postecoglou has said that it is not sustainable for Son Heung-Min to feature in every match for Tottenham this season and that the forward has already played more than was initially planned in the opening weeks of the new campaign.

results.title: What now for Joshua after another loss? Can Dubois get Usyk, Fury?
results.creator: Nick Parkinson
results.description: LONDON -- Anthony Joshua's career has not been ruined by Saturday's devastating knockout loss to Daniel Dubois challenging for the IBF heavyweight title. But Joshua's latest setback leaves us wondering whether we will ever see him face former heavyweight champion Tyson Fury.

results.title: Win projections for all 30 NBA teams ahead of the 2024-25 season
results.creator: Kevin Pelton, ESPN Senior Writer
results.description: NBA training camp starts next week, and as teams prepare for preseason, it's time to make projections for how all 30 will perform this upcoming season.
